summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to drainage services of Seattle Public Utilities; establishing a stormwater facility credit to reduce drainage service charges for parcels with approved stormwater management facilities; updating definitions, revising the performance requirements for rainwater harvesting systems qualifying for drainage service charge reductions, revising the basis for bill adjustment requests and revising the right of entry for inspection in connection with the credit program; and amending Chapter 21.33 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
